Package org.forgerock.openam.keystore

Class KeyStoreConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.forgerock.openam.keystore.KeyStoreConfig
  • public class KeyStoreConfig
extends Object
    Holds a Keystore Configuration. This gets serialized to/from JSON as part of boot.json

    todo: This functionality should be moved into the commons project There is just enough functionality here to support OpenAM boot.json

    Since:
    14.0

      Initialize and load the keystore described by this configuration todo: This is just enough to get the current keystore.jceks opened When this is moved to commons the functionality should be expanded to open all keystore types There are a number of possible exceptions that can be generated - they are consolidated to a single type and the underlying exception is wrapped.

                           throws IOException
        Get the keystore password.
        Returns:
        The keystore password as a char array
        Throws:

      • getKeyPassword

        public char[] getKeyPassword()
                      throws IOException
        Get the key password used to unlock key entries.
        Returns:

        Throws:

      • loadKeyStore

        public KeyStore loadKeyStore()
                      throws KeyStoreException
        Initialize and load the keystore described by this configuration todo: This is just enough to get the current keystore.jceks opened When this is moved to commons the functionality should be expanded to open all keystore types There are a number of possible exceptions that can be generated - they are consolidated to a single type and the underlying exception is wrapped.
        Returns:
        the opened KeyStore
        Throws:
        KeyStoreException - if the keystore can not be opened or initialized.
